name: Forest Soul (Windows and Mac)
description:
Website: https://austinn10.wixsite.com/forestsoul

Hello!

Welcome to Forest Soul, a game about playing as a woodland critter, saving Asukyada Forest from the invasion of Shadow Elves. This game is a 3D endless runner with (eventual) narrative elements.

While the game is very much still in Alpha, I created this project as a capstone project for my classes. I am senior at the University of Arizona and will be hopefully graduating May 2021. I hope you enjoy it
